timeline.bodyText: FYI an aspiration idea behind some of our modules like CoreGraphNode or CorePluginFramework is that it is portable (and could be used by other projects). Adding more dependencies needs to be considered carefully. In this case I don't have an issue as it is 3rd party jars. CoreGraphNode is also heavily linked to NetBeans now anyway...
